articles.title: Recent homes sales in Greater Boston (Feb. 25)
articles.description:
ACTON 246 Main St. #6 Condo Town House, built in 2004, 1,040 square feet, 4 rooms, 2 bedrooms, 2 baths. $450,000 11 Davis Road #A5 Condo/Apt, built in 1976, 869 square feet, 2 bedrooms, 2 baths. $270,000 AMESBURY 486 Main St. One-family conventional, built in 1850, 1,771 square feet, 7 rooms, 3 bedrooms, 3 baths, […]

The post Recent homes sales in Greater Boston (Feb. 25) appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Acton condo at 246 Main St. sold for $450,000 on February 25.
Amesbury home at 486 Main St. sold for $450,000, impacting local housing market.
Recent sales indicate rising property values in Greater Boston, affecting affordability.
